articles.title: Neanderthals Were Rendering Fat 125,000 Years Ago: New Evidence Revealed - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: New evidence reveals that Neanderthals were rendering fat from animal bones 125,000 years ago.
articles.content: A groundbreaking study published in Science Advances have revealed new evidence about Neanderthal survival strategies, suggesting they were rendering fat from animal bones nearly 125,000 years agolon… [+5357 chars]
